Author: hayleyley
Text: Exactly! Purging used to be reserved for binges but now I’ll eat a couple bites of salad with full intention of purging it. The only thing I’m comfortable keeping down guilt free anymore is broth

Author: juicy_sweatsuits
Text: It’s so addicting too, like once you start and get on that high of eating but feeling skinny after, it’s become an addiction. I drove myself crazy too, after any meal I’d throw up. Sandwich? throw up. Ice cream? Gone. Salad? Let’s taste that lettuce again. It’s extremely toxic. I’d time it every time I ate and when I could throw up next. It’s a hard mentality to break. I wish I never would have started.
